channel.title: Addon Development on ChrisK91.me
channel.description: Recent content in Addon Development on ChrisK91.me

item.title: Building Anki 2.1 on Windows 10
item.description: Anki 2.1 is the upcoming version of the popular spaced repetition software. If you want to write plugins, you might want to have the option to run Anki 2.1 from source for debugging purposes. Here I will outline, how I set up my system to build and run Anki from source.

item.title: Setting up VSCode for Anki add on development.
item.description: VSCode has become a powerful editor for Python. Here I share my setup, to develop Anki addons using VSCode.
